featured.text: Robot Redford’s speech was discussed in this article mainly because .
Robot Redford was followed by a person, William Bakaleinikoff, who spoke about the need for cooperation between people and technology.
The speaker was Robot Redford, a robot who delivered the commencement address at a community college in suburban Maryland.
Which of the following statements is NOT true? (A) Robot Redford was a talking machine. (B) Robot Redford walked to the stage by itself.
Mr. Bakaleinikoff’s experience with his topic included the fact that he had created Robot Redford and had provided the voice for the robot’s words to the graduates.

definition.zh_def: 雷德福（Robert Redford），美國演員、導演和製片人，以其在電影界的貢獻而聞名。
definition.en_def: Redford refers to Robert Redford, an American actor, director, and producer known for his contributions to the film industry.
definition.example: Robert Redford won an Academy Award for his role in 'Ordinary People'.
